Name: Mò The Frog
About the game: Mo the frog is a classic 2D platform in which you will have to committ fully to ho through many levels that are present in the game. Dress the part of Mò the frog in the epic adventure to free Avalaar's kingdom from the oppression which the terrible Peter's the troll and his henchmen, the black captains, try to bring by conquering it. Cross forests, caves, cities and mountains and fight the three black captains to deal with tyrannical Peter in the end. In this 2D platform you will dress the part of Mò the frog known as Mofrog, a little frog who has just become guard of the frogs' forest, who decides not to give in Peter's and his henchmen's tyranny but wants to fight guided by his more expert and older friend mo the crow through the regions of Avalaar's kingdom. You will meet new friends ready to help you on your mission but also a lot of enemies and traitors who will do anything to ruin their plans. Going on in the game you will become increasingly stronger by obtaining more life and new powers with which you can face your adventure in a better way and travel through the levels that you've already overcome on a different light. This and more is mo the frog.
